title: Are project orbs SURPOSE to give non-project skins?
body:
I thought you were suppose to get project skin shard form them? not random ones.
Can riot ACTUALLY fucking list what you COULD get in shit like this instead of leaving it blank and naming it "PROJECT: Orb"

replies.body: It does list lmao ... in the home tab

No sorry I found it, the home tab was bugged for me when I first looked, I just assumed it just showed the current event stuff, after ressetting the client it now show's what I can get, but riot should still list down below when you go to craft it, they have every other time.

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MyzKHsul,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-27T18:13:35.954+0000)
>
> It does list lmao ... in the home tab

No clicking on it, or even hovering over it just says project orb.
